sn35.131:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
sn35.131:4.2: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.131:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho nakulapitā gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.131:4.4: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme no parinibbāyanti?
sn35.131:4.5: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti?
sn35.131:4.6: “Santi kho, gahapati, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.131:4.7: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.131:4.8: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.131:4.9: Saupādāno, gahapati, bhikkhu no parinibbāyati … pe …
sn35.131:4.10: santi kho, gahapati, jivhāviññeyyā rasā … pe …
sn35.131:4.11: santi kho, gahapati, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.131:4.12: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.131:4.13: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.131:4.15: Ayaṃ kho, gahapati, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme no parinibbāyanti.
sn35.131:5.1: Santi ca kho, gahapati, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.131:5.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.131:5.3: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato na tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti, na tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.131:5.5: santi kho, gahapati, jivhāviññeyyā rasā … pe …
sn35.131:5.6: santi kho, gahapati, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.131:5.7: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.131:5.8: Tassa taṃ nābhinandato nābhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato na tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti na tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.131:5.10: Ayaṃ kho, gahapati, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti.
